snippet.title: TRAILER.  The Wickie : Journey of a Lighthouse Keeper
snippet.description:
Step into the shadows of The Wickie, a first-person cosmic horror adventure set in the windswept isolation of 1936 Scotland. Join Bill Fisher, a newly appointed lighthouse keeper, as he uncovers the eerie secrets of Pandora's Rock—an island shrouded in fog and legends. What starts as a simple assignment quickly spirals into a chilling confrontation with ancient forces, supernatural mysteries, and your own sanity.

In this atmospheric trailer, witness the haunting beauty and lurking dread that define The Wickie. Discover:

An Isolated World of Intrigue: Explore Pandora’s Rock and its desolate ruins, hidden temples, and sprawling mines, all brought to life with stunning detail and immersive environmental storytelling.
Mysterious NPC Encounters: Meet the strange inhabitants of the island, hand-drawn and hauntingly animated, who offer cryptic insights into the mysteries beneath the surface.
Survival and Discovery: With your wits as your only weapon, navigate treacherous terrain, solve intricate puzzles, and tread carefully, as the island's dark forces lie in wait.
Cosmic Horror Inspired by Lovecraft: Uncover ancient powers and confront the unknown in an experience where every choice pulls you deeper into the mysteries of the abyss.
Will you hold your sanity together long enough to discover the truth, or will the island's curse consume you?

Light the way in The Wickie, coming soon. Wishlist now to be one of the first to explore Pandora’s Rock, where secrets hide in every shadow.
